1. Manchester United is a professional football club based in Old Trafford, Greater Manchester, England.
2. The club was founded as Newton Heath LYR Football Club in 1878, changed its name to Manchester United in 1902, and moved to its current stadium, Old Trafford, in 1910.
3. Manchester United has won more trophies than any other club in English football, with a record 20 League titles, 12 FA Cups, 5 League Cups, and a record 21 FA Community Shields.
4. The club has also won three UEFA Champions Leagues, one UEFA Europa League, one UEFA Cup Winners' Cup, one UEFA Super Cup, one Intercontinental Cup, and one FIFA Club World Cup.
5. Manchester United is one of the most widely supported football clubs in the world, and has been named by Forbes magazine as the world's most valuable football club for a record 11 consecutive years.
